text: The 1924 Copa Ibarguren was the 12° edition of this National cup of Argentina. It was played by the champions of both leagues, Primera División and Liga Rosarina de Football crowned during 1924.Argentina - Copa Ibarguren by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF Boca Juniors (Primera División champion) faced Club Atlético Belgrano (Liga Rosarina champion)"Hacemos memoria: Hoy 1924" on Liga Rosarina website, 17 Mar 2015Club titles on Belgrano website at Sportivo Barracas stadium.
